title: Jameela Jamil rocks a white pantsuit while out and about in New York City
text:
Jameela Jamil stepped out in New York City on Friday night, rocking a pristine white pantsuit while out and about.

The 33 year old star of The Good Place stepped out in a white pantsuit for a night out in the Big Apple.

Earlier in the day, she was spotted with Joe Gatto at Buzzfeed's AM to DM, where they were promoting their new TBS game show The Misery Index.

Jameela is out: Jameela Jamil stepped out in New York City on Friday night, rocking a pristine white pantsuit while out and about

Jamil was wearing a stylish white pantsuit with gold buttons on her white coat and wide-legged pants.

She was wearing a leopard print turtleneck under her suit coat, with elaborate hoop earrings while holding her phone with a red case.

She completed her look with a pair of tan flat Rothy's shoes with white soles as she stepped out in New York City.

Jameela's look: Jamil was wearing a stylish white pantsuit with gold buttons on her white coat and wide-legged pants, pairing them with tan Rothy's shoes

Earlier in the day, Jamil was joined by Joe Gatto from Impractical Jokers to promote The Misery Index, premiering October 22 on TBS.

She wore the same pantsuit and earrings for her appearance, but went without the leopard print turtleneck.

She also wore thick black boots for her AM to DM appearance before changing to her brown flats for her night out.

AM to DM: Earlier in the day, Jamil was joined by Joe Gatto from Impractical Jokers to promote The Misery Index, premiering October 22 on TBS

Jamil hosts the program, with Gatto and his Impractical Jokers co-stars Brian Quinn, James Murray and Sal Vulcano serving as recurring panelists with the comedy troupe The Tenderloins teaming up with contestants.

The game will feature two teams, each consisting of one contestant and one Tenderloin member, who, 'compete in a game of stakes ranking hysterically miserable real-life experiences - from getting stuck overnight in an elevator to walking in on your grandparents having sex.'

These experiences are graded on a scale of 1-100, known as The Misery Index, a ranking system created by a team of therapists.

Gatto and Jamil: Jamil hosts the program, with Gatto and his Impractical Jokers co-stars Brian Quinn, James Murray and Sal Vulcano serving as recurring panelists with the comedy troupe The Tenderloins teaming up with contestants

New show: These experiences are graded on a scale of 1-100, known as The Misery Index, a ranking system created by a team of therapists

Jamil also stars as Tahani Al-Jamil on NBC's hit comedy series The Good Place, which is currently airing its fourth and final season.

She also stars in How to Build a Girl, alongside Emma Thompson, Sharon Horgan and Beanie Feldstein, which doesn't have a release date yet.

The actress also voices Pushpa in the upcoming animated series Mira, Royal Detective, which doesn't have a premiere date either.

Good place: Jamil also stars as Tahani Al-Jamil on NBC's hit comedy series The Good Place, which is currently airing its fourth and final season
description: Jameela Jamil stepped out in New York City on Friday night, rocking a pristine white pantsuit while out and about.
